imageCaption: Creative direction / brand identity / ui / ux
obstacle: the old brand and website experience had become fractured and outdated. it was not a proper reflection of the agency's high-end, bespoke capabilities.
outcome: a new brand and website experience that aligns with One North's position as an elite digital experience agency for sophisticated professional service organizations.
title: One North
objective: create a new brand identity and website experience that aligns with the agency's promise of developing engaging digital experiences for complex businesses.
description: an agency focused on creating and nurturing powerful digital experiences that drive growth
